title: Newest Video Gravitating Karma!

embed.description: 11mins of Karma Play to Twisted by Wayne G and Sweet Dreams by Eurythmics.

body:
Hey everyone, this is my latest, its video number 38, I thought I'd match the music 'karma' related. Enjoy the montage in the style of a lol music clip. And if ya like it feel free to checkout my channel.
[http://www.youtube.com/c/SentienceLOL]

replies.body: Cool video, nice game play and I like the song choices.
